title: Python Sequence Fundamentals
description: Python Sequences are ordered collections of items. They are indexed by integers.

meta.title: Python Sequences | Ordered Data Collections
meta.description: Explore the core sequence data types in Python, including strings, lists, and tuples. Learn how to access, manipulate, and combine these ordered collections.
meta.keywords: Python, Sequences, Strings, Lists, Tuples, Data Types, Indexing, Concatenation

i18n.description: Python 序列是有序的项目集合。它们由整数索引。
